#summary Instructions on how to build LogicDiscovery

= What you'll need =

 * ST's peripheral library and USB library. [http://www.st.com/internet/mcu/product/252148.jsp Find it here]
 * GCC cross-compiler, e.g. [http://www.yagarto.de/ Yagartoo]

= Tuning makefile =

 Set TCHAIN variable to prefix of your toolchain.
 Set STLIBS variable to location where you have extracted ST's libs.
